title: $:/litClock/times/-18:04-Mark Twain
quote_first: “We will make record of it, my Rosannah; every year, as this dear hour chimes from the clock, we will celebrate it with thanksgivings, all the years of our life.” “We will, we will, Alonzo!” “
quoteSourceTitle: The Loves of Alonzo Fitz Clarence and Rosannah Ethelton
